title: Wastewater-Based Protocols for SARS-CoV-2: Insights into Virus Concentration, Extraction and Quantitation Methods from Two Years of Public Health Surveillance

The ongoing COVID-19 pandemic has accelerated the development and application of wastewater-based disease surveillance (WBS) as a tool for public health practice. The wide variety of WBS methods currently in...
